# Facets of the Gemcaster
## Overview
The articles in this grouping comprise the new facets of the [[Gemcaster|gemcaster]] mentioned in the [[Svirfneblin]] [[Gemcaster]] class introduced in *[[Underworld Races and Classes]]*. See the list of Governed Content on the right for a complete list of names and links.

---
